title: Stronger in Your Hands
description: The Making of a Man Book Three. Eighteen and still trapped at prep school, Alex feels he and Jared will never get together, and then a surprise visit from Jared puts all doubt to rest. After Alex graduates, everything seems to fall right into place. The heat between them is scorching, but secrets from Jaredâ€™s past and his need to take care of everyone around him jeopardizes their fledgling relationship. How will they build a future if Jared can't to face the past?
author: Diane  Adams
